    DXC_OUT_KIND Â¶
    Source

    DXC_OUT_KIND :: enum u32 {
	NONE           = 0, 
	OBJECT         = 1, 
	ERRORS         = 2, 
	PDB            = 3, 
	SHADER_HASH    = 4, 
	DISASSEMBLY    = 5, 
	HLSL           = 6, 
	TEXT           = 7, 
	REFLECTION     = 8, 
	ROOT_SIGNATURE = 9, 
	EXTRA_OUTPUTS  = 10, 
	FORCE_DWORD    = 4294967295, 
}
